tha-ap69:0.3_0: On Subhā, the senior in Judge
tha-ap69:1.1_0: I was born in the Virūpakkha,
tha-ap69:1.4_0: among the fragrance of the fairykind.
tha-ap69:10.1_0: The seventh submerged in the middle of the senior monks.
tha-ap69:5.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
tha-ap69:6.1_0: When continued existence has become extinguished,
tha-ap69:6.3_0: There are six classes of space
tha-ap69:6.4_0: The fruit of good and results.
tha-ap69:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap69:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rohitassa.
